alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walton and central Washington Counties through NOON CDT... At 1126 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vernon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Whitehead Crossroads, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Sylvania and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
